mapper.select: select * from (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY b1.book_isbn ORDER BY b1.book_num DESC ) AS RNUM, b1.* , b2.cnt as book_cnt FROM book b1 join (select book_isbn , COUNT(book_isbn) as cnt from book GROUP BY book_isbn ) b2 on b1.book_isbn = b2.book_isbn where book_title like '%' || #{ book_Title } || '%' and book_aut like '%' || #{ book_Aut } || '%' and book_pub like '%' || #{ book_Pub } || '%' )bk where RNUM = 1
